bgpz.title: BGPP
bgpz.description: The Borankol Gas Processing Plant (BGPP) is one of Kazakhstan’s facilities processing associated and natural gas, with a design capacity of 3.6 billion m³/year of gas and 730 thousand m³/year of liquid. Since the completion of the first stage in 2007, the plant has continuously evolved, implementing innovative technologies, automation, and energy optimization. The second modernization stage in 2025 and the vision for 2030 aim at full production digitalization, carbon neutrality, and minimal environmental impact.
